at.pm.rs.graphics

Class TextWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.pm.rs.graphics.FileWriter
      • at.pm.rs.graphics.TextWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writer

    public class TextWriter
extends FileWriter
    This class creates a Writer object that prints text to a file. It generates from the given SetOfData the fitting relations model.
    Version:
    20150114
    Author:
    Patrick Malik
